name: Air Raid Over Britain
detailed_description:
Just Updated

Thanks to everyone who has downloaded and experienced Air Raid Over Britain during our early preview builds. This project has been an exploratory discovery as to what does and doesn't work in a purely hands-off VR experiences. With this latest release we have completely revamped and updated the Air Raid Over Britain experience. Based on community feedback and in-person demos, we've completely overhauled the core functionality of Air Raid Over Britain. It now includes more interaction and gameplay mechanics as well as a completely new "look-at" mechanic. You'll find additional layers of knowledge and gameplay throughout Air Raid Over Britain shedding better light on the history of "The Blitz" (1940-1941) and other various aspects of WWII.

Note: This demo is still a work-in-progress. We appreciate your feedback and suggestions on how we can improve this experience in future builds.


About the Game

Early Preview: Air Raid Over Britain is currently in Early Preview. This is a early look at our development of a hands-off VR experience. Note: this game is still in production and does not necessarily reflect the final product.

Air Raid Over Britain is a short VR experience / technical demo that places you in the heart of a small English town during "The Blitz" (1940-1941). In this VR experience you can discover facts about WWII through an interactive, look-at mechanic as well as experiencing an immersive, on-the-ground perspective of an actual air raid by German HE-111s.

Note: This demo is still a work-in-progress. We appreciate your feedback and suggestions on how we can improve this experience in future builds.

short_description: Air Raid Over Britain (technical demo) places you in the heart of a small English town during the "The Blitz" (1940-1941). Uncover facts about WWII and experience an actual air raid by German HE-111s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
